Lee was a great easy rider and guide, the views and stops were stunning. I canâ€™t recommend doing the pass enough, especially with Lee.

Great day doing Hai Van pass with some great scenery, Lee is an excellent tour guide with some great staff!

Lee is the greatest guide in the world. Super fun, informative and knowledgeable. We stopped at the perfect amount of places. Also, it was our first time driving so Lee made sure we were comfortable and proficient on the motorbikes before we left. Perfect trip.

Lee is the best guide for the haivan pass. Great experience and definetly worth while. We saw waterfalls, beaches, the marble mountain and everything was great.
